content: A while ago I posted this for changing resource URLs for local debugging: https://bit.ly/3gWRwZ4 Since then I've switched to using @requestly_ext instead for Chrome: easy on/off toggling and I can use it to debug with the local version of my libraries on remote websites too!
author: Lea Verou

content: I'd rate it as one of the best extensions around to boost developer productivity. Even if you're not a developer but need to navigate through loads of seemingly similar web pages, it is highly recommended with a very small learning curve.
author: Mukul Gupta

content: Requestly is a fantastic tool. It has made our team's life so much easier and more productive. Totally Recommend!
author: Rafael Gibelli

content: Requestly has been a lifesaver for testing our product on our customers websites. Everyone's stage sites are a hot mess of half finished dev projects, but Requestly allows us to mock up stage sites in seconds that better reflect the live sites!
author: Robert Wharton

content: Requestly just works :) We are one of the paid users. We have been using Requestly to debug SendX Javascript API on our client's websites and Requestly has saved ton of debugging time for us.
author: Varun Jain

content: A really good app for web developers. I'm going to make it a must-use app among my reportees.
author: Kunal Chitkara

content: Thank you for making this great addon. I just checked out Requestly and indeed it is very easy to set up. It helps me customize my browsing experience entirely. Keep up the great work!
author: Kos Breton

content: This extension has made my developer life much simpler. I recommend it to all my colleagues. Thank you
author: Shagun Sodhani

content: It allows me to convert my Chrome browser into a supercharged development tool by creating advanced rules to modify the requests that the website is making. Very useful to quickly tweak API parameters and image resolutions without any code change!
author: Param Aggarwal

content: This is a killer extension. So many good use cases. We use it often.
author: Ben Munk

content: Awesome tool, it is being used by my whole team. 'Export rules' feature is great !!
author: Lalit Sharma

content: The requestly extension is very nice and very useful. Moreover the support we get from their team is praiseworthy. Thanks a lot Sachin Jain for your support and timely help.
author: Kedar Saravate

content: I've used this product for three years and it's been extremely useful. This extension has helped me gain a following of over fifty-thousand subscribers. I couldn't have done it without Requestly. Easy to use yet advanced when you need it.
author: Brent Holze

content: Very slick and modern UI that also supports keyboard shortcuts. What's not to love there? I have only used it to make sure I am always giving a forum I support it's Amazon referral link even if I visit Amazon without going through that forum. The 'Modify query parameters' rule allowed me to do that quite easily.
author: Dan

content: I use Requestly to seamlessly remove UTM parameters to minimize tracking and more easily avoid duplicates for read-it-later apps like Pocket. Very easy to set up and support is incredibly responsive!
author: Evan

content: I'm surprised how straightforward this extension is - it did exactly what i need (in my case, adding a url parameter to a specific host), and without any hitches or issues.
author: John Doe

content: A must have, you can for example very easily enable / disable scripts for testing, setup cache buster especially when you have multiple caching solutions, swap to minify file to beauty files automatically... and I have just started to use the tool. Sachin is very helpful if you any issue.
author: Jerome Crametz

content: Best extension, PERIOD. It can basically restore anything without any problems. No more questions, BEST, EXTENSION, EVER!
author: PrestoAnimations

content: This extension can also be used for making boring things in games to something cool like hats in moomoo.io and skins in other games etc. Really now my hats look better in moomoo.io
author: Abhay Gaming

content: Fantastic, versatile and endlessly useful. I don't know what I'd do without it.
author: Alex Koffler

content: Excellent extension! the only one I found that does exactly what I needed, it's extremely helpful to manage multiple google suite and personnal accounts and saves me tons of time. Also, the support was super helpful when I had some questions initially.
author: Mehdi Bellatig

content: Great product to update links on a page. In my case I want to change a web link to an app link to open links in a specific app and not web and this works great. Also I received some support for what I want and the support was great, fast and really helped me.
author: Laurence Cope

content: Thank you so much for providing a glorious tool to help retrieve things back in GoAnimate/Vyond, and thanks for replying to my message a few months ago. 5 stars for you! ;-)
author: MJ, the Spirit
